description:
Description
===========
I created a instance with local disk, and live migrated it, and this action failed.

Steps to reproduce
==================
A chronological list of steps which will bring off the
issue you noticed:
* I did create a instance with local disk
* then I did live-migration
* then instance was active, task_state was none and it was still on source compute node.

Expected result
===============
live-migration action is successful.

Environment
===========
1. Exact version of OpenStack you are running. See the following
  list for all releases: http://docs.openstack.org/releases/

$ git log -1

commit 8435999c782d4cca00c9e362e393019b43abb366
Merge: 9a26e92 6e81fa4
Author: Jenkins <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 17 23:01:21 2016 +0000

    Merge "Re-deprecate use_usb_tablet config option"

2. Which hypervisor did you use?
   Libvirt + KVM,

3. Which storage type did you use?
   local disk

Logs & Configs
===========
2016-08-13 14:57:55.649 INFO nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Increasing downtime to 46 ms after 0 sec elapsed time
2016-08-13 14:57:56.368 INFO nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Migration running for 0 secs, memory 100% remaining; (bytes processed=0, remaining=0, total=0)
2016-08-13 14:57:56.901 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Live Migration failure: Unable to pre-create chardev file '/opt/stack/data/instances/b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2/console.log': No such file or directory
libvirtError: Unable to pre-create chardev file '/opt/stack/data/instances/b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2/console.log': No such file or directory
2016-08-13 14:57:57.372 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Migration operation has aborted
title: live-migration due to Unable to pre-create chardev file console.log

comments.content:
Description
===========
I created a instance with local disk, and live migrated it, and this action failed.

Steps to reproduce
==================
A chronological list of steps which will bring off the
issue you noticed:
* I did create a instance with local disk
* then I did live-migration
* then instance was active, task_state was none and it was still on source compute node.


Expected result
===============
live-migration action sis successful.


Environment
===========
1. Exact version of OpenStack you are running. See the following
  list for all releases: http://docs.openstack.org/releases/

$ git log -1

commit 8435999c782d4cca00c9e362e393019b43abb366
Merge: 9a26e92 6e81fa4
Author: Jenkins <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 17 23:01:21 2016 +0000

    Merge "Re-deprecate use_usb_tablet config option"

2. Which hypervisor did you use?
   Libvirt + KVM,

3. Which storage type did you use?
   local disk

Logs & Configs
===========
2016-08-13 14:57:55.649 INFO nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Increasing downtime to 46 ms after 0 sec elapsed time
2016-08-13 14:57:56.368 INFO nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Migration running for 0 secs, memory 100% remaining; (bytes processed=0, remaining=0, total=0)
2016-08-13 14:57:56.901 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Live Migration failure: Unable to pre-create chardev file '/opt/stack/data/instances/b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2/console.log': No such file or directory
libvirtError: Unable to pre-create chardev file '/opt/stack/data/instances/b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2/console.log': No such file or directory
2016-08-13 14:57:57.372 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-2eb18c6b-01c8-4b5c-8aba-248624263cc5 admin admin] [instance: b8301519-e567-4222-813c-eb13653351e2] Migration operation has aborted
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hanrong

comments.content:
compute node1 nova.conf /opt/stack/data/nova/instances
compute node2 nova.conf /opt/stack/data/instances

nova.conf is error.
